entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 1:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: SE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
